title: Keep Your Pets Warm
description: Provide cozy blankets, warm bedding, and heated pet pads to keep your pets comfortable during the cold months.

title: Proper Nutrition
description: Feed pets high-quality food and maintain proper hydration. Cold weather increases their energy requirements.

title: Regular Exercise
description: Even in winter, make sure your pets get daily exercise to stay healthy and prevent stiffness or weight gain.

title: Protect Paws
description: Check and clean your pets' paws after outdoor walks to remove ice, salt, or chemicals that may irritate them.
